sdg-SL_TLF_NEET-_O-15-24.def: The NEET is defined as the percentage of youth (15-24 years old) who are not in employment and not in education or training.
sdg-SL_TLF_NEET-_O-15-24.name: Proportion of youth not in education, employment or training, by sex and age (%)
sdg-SL_TLF_NEET-_O-15-24.source: Source: ILO modelled estimates, November 2021, available in ILOSTAT (https://ilostat.ilo.org/). For the specific sources by country and the estimation methodology refer to ILOSTAT directly.
